column2: Latest;Phnom Penh: Breaking news: A fire has reportedly broken out in the basement of Olympia Mall.------Firefighting units are at the scene. Early reports suggest a vehicle may have caught fire in the parking lot (*seemingly incorrect).------UPDATE: As of 11 am
column3: fire crews are still at the scene. The ------latest reports ------suggest an electrical fault on a construction site close to the mall may be the cause.
